posts.content:
Hi , I,m after someone to strip and rebuild my 1500 engine .

Its out of a 1966 11 window splitscreen bus , its been stood 20 years,

any recommendations ? I,m in Gloucestershire.

Thanks for looking , Doug

Doug, if you've got some tools I'd have a go at stripping it yourself.
Just get a bunch of small-medium size boxes/ containers / jam jars.
Take photos of EVERY STEP.
And enjoy finding out how your engine works.

If you do a search you'll find my engine rebuild thread. I didn't actually rebuild it because some one pinched it but there is a detailed strip down.

Jason

dougall up wrote: â†‘Mon Nov 18, 2019 9:59 pm Hi , I,m after someone to strip and rebuild my 1500 engine .

Its out of a 1966 11 window splitscreen bus , its been stood 20 years,

any recommendations ? I,m in Gloucestershire.

Thanks for looking , Doug
Hi
Doug
I can rebuild your 1500 engine,i specialise in standard air cooled rebuilds,using as many genuine parts as possible.i have built several 1500 singleport engines for splitscreens and hold lots of parts stock.
Check out some of my work on facebook
Or give me a call to discuss
Cheers
Paul
